name: Shooter Vs Zombies
description:
This a game I created on my second year at university during my Game A Week assignment. You can find out more about the Game A Week on my Instagram page @Sam_Mifflin.

https://www.instagram.com/sam_mifflin/

The theme for this week was indirect control

In this game you drag the player in front of the zombies before they get to your base. This game was inspired by Plants Vs Zombies. Made using Unity & Visual Studio.

I hope you enjoy.
